languages.text: "Что может знать о красоте мон-кай, чье проклятое око убивает все живое? Беды постигли Лилэтан из-за скверны подобной той, что ты несешь в себе".
"What can you know of beauty, a mon-keigh whose cursed eye kills all living things? The Lilaethan is plagued by calamity because of corruption similar to the foulness that you carry within you."
languages.original_text: "Что может знать о красоте мон-кай, чье проклятое око убивает все живое? Беды постигли Лилэтан из-за скверны подобной той, что ты несешь в себе".

traits.locale_text: "What can you know of beauty, a mon-keigh whose cursed eye kills all living things? The Lilaethan is plagued by calamity because of corruption similar to the foulness that you carry within you."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What can you know of beauty, a mon-keigh whose cursed eye kills all living things? The Lilaethan is plagued by calamity because of corruption similar to the foulness that you carry within you."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What can you know of beauty, a mon-keigh whose cursed eye kills all living things? The Lilaethan is plagued by calamity because of corruption similar to the foulness that you carry within you."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What can you know of beauty, a mon-keigh whose cursed eye kills all living things? The Lilaethan is plagued by calamity because of corruption similar to the foulness that you carry within you."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “你这只猴子，你额头上的诅咒之眼可以杀死一切活物，你真的明白什么是美吗？莉莱赞的灾难就是由腐化造成的，那股腐化与你身上所携带的污秽，来自同一个源头。”
languages.original_text: "What can you know of beauty, a mon-keigh whose cursed eye kills all living things? The Lilaethan is plagued by calamity because of corruption similar to the foulness that you carry within you."

traits.locale_text: “你这只猴子，你额头上的诅咒之眼可以杀死一切活物，你真的明白什么是美吗？莉莱赞的灾难就是由腐化造成的，那股腐化与你身上所携带的污秽，来自同一个源头。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Et que savez-vous de la beauté, vous, la mon-keigh qui peut tuer tout être vivant d'un seul regard ? La lilaethan subit calamité sur calamité parce qu'elle est corrompue par la même infamie que vous portez en vous. »
languages.original_text: "What can you know of beauty, a mon-keigh whose cursed eye kills all living things? The Lilaethan is plagued by calamity because of corruption similar to the foulness that you carry within you."

traits.locale_text: « Et que savez-vous de la beauté, vous, la mon-keigh qui peut tuer tout être vivant d'un seul regard ? La lilaethan subit calamité sur calamité parce qu'elle est corrompue par la même infamie que vous portez en vous. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «¿Qué sabe de belleza una mon-keigh cuyo ojo maldito mata todo lo que vive? El Lilaethan ha sufrido una hecatombe por corrupción similar a la inmundicia que hay que en tu interior».
languages.original_text: "What can you know of beauty, a mon-keigh whose cursed eye kills all living things? The Lilaethan is plagued by calamity because of corruption similar to the foulness that you carry within you."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué sabe de belleza una mon-keigh cuyo ojo maldito mata todo lo que vive? El Lilaethan ha sufrido una hecatombe por corrupción similar a la inmundicia que hay que en tu interior».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「何が美しいというのだ、呪われた目で生きとし生けるものを殺し尽くすモン＝ケイよ？リラエタンが災厄に苦しんでいるのは、あなたたちが運んできた汚れと類似の腐敗が原因だ」
languages.original_text: "What can you know of beauty, a mon-keigh whose cursed eye kills all living things? The Lilaethan is plagued by calamity because of corruption similar to the foulness that you carry within you."

traits.locale_text: 「何が美しいというのだ、呪われた目で生きとし生けるものを殺し尽くすモン＝ケイよ？リラエタンが災厄に苦しんでいるのは、あなたたちが運んできた汚れと類似の腐敗が原因だ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Was wisst Ihr schon von Schönheit, ein Chem-Pan-Sey, dessen verfluchtes Auge alle Lebewesen tötet? Warum wird die Lileath denn von Katastrophen heimgesucht? Doch nur wegen einer Korruption, die der Fäulnis in Euch ähnelt."
languages.original_text: "What can you know of beauty, a mon-keigh whose cursed eye kills all living things? The Lilaethan is plagued by calamity because of corruption similar to the foulness that you carry within you."

traits.locale_text: "Was wisst Ihr schon von Schönheit, ein Chem-Pan-Sey, dessen verfluchtes Auge alle Lebewesen tötet? Warum wird die Lileath denn von Katastrophen heimgesucht? Doch nur wegen einer Korruption, die der Fäulnis in Euch ähnelt."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "What can you know of beauty, a mon-keigh whose cursed eye kills all living things? The Lilaethan is plagued by calamity because of corruption similar to the foulness that you carry within you."

languages.text: "Lanetli gözleri tüm canlıları ölüp geçen bir mon-keigh, güzellikten ne anlar? Lilaethan, senin de içinde sakladığın kötülüğe benzer bir yozluk yüzünden dirlik yüzü görmüyor."
languages.original_text: "What can you know of beauty, a mon-keigh whose cursed eye kills all living things? The Lilaethan is plagued by calamity because of corruption similar to the foulness that you carry within you."

traits.locale_text: "Lanetli gözleri tüm canlıları ölüp geçen bir mon-keigh, güzellikten ne anlar? Lilaethan, senin de içinde sakladığın kötülüğe benzer bir yozluk yüzünden dirlik yüzü görmüyor."
